description.en:
BitBay is a free, decentralized marketplace for buying and selling goods and services on the blockchain. You can connect directly with peers and transact without the need for a middleman like Amazon, eBay, or Craigslist. Transactions are secure and anonymous. They’re also guaranteed by escrow. The project aims to be the new standard for eCommerce, allowing individuals to trade one-to-one at scale. As a result, BitBay claims it will revolutionize global trade. It’s seemingly a great solution for other niche applications as well, where groups of people aren’t served by existing marketplaces. In the beginning, BitBay got off to a rocky start. In 2014, the original founders raised capital in bad faith and quickly abandoned the project after fundraising, leaving the lead developer holding the bag. It seemed like BitBay was finished, but the developer continued working on the project out of a sense of duty to the original investors, without access to the capital raised in the fundraising round.

The BAY token is the transactional token in the marketplace. You use it to buy and sell, and it can also participate in freezes, escrow, bets, swaps, etc. The token itself operates like Bitcoin and is secured by the network. Although you can use BAY for transactions, you don’t have to. You do, however, have to use BAY if you’d like to take part in token staking. BAY’s price cratered after the original founders left and stayed low until March 2017 when it took off. It has been through several cycles of bull and bear runs, with a max price over 30 cents in January 2018 before retreating to its current value.

BitBay supports all kinds of privacy and security measures. It’s easy to create a multisignature wallet for added security. There are integrations for Tor and other proxies that help anonymize your connection to the marketplace. An on-screen keyboard allows for password or key entry without using your keyboard and being susceptible to keylogging. Additionally, you can create images with your private key embedded, so that finding a stored key is more difficult for a hacker. The marketplace also has functionality for time locking contracts and swapping currencies. This enables all kinds of cross-chain transactions and financial implements. The time lock and other smart contract elements make it possible to create bets, escrow, futures and options trades, or any number of other financial transactions.

The idea and implementation by BitBay, of a decentralized marketplace and trading platform is brilliant and shows further promise of expansion.The rocky beginning of the cryptocurrency and its subsequent comeback as a promising platform indicate that the developers are in it for the long haul and don’t plan on abandoning the platform after all these years.

It seemed like BitBay was finished, but the developer continued working on the project out of a sense of duty to the original investors, without access to the capital raised in the fundraising round.

The BAY token is the transactional token in the marketplace. You use it to buy and sell, and it can also participate in freezes, escrow, bets, swaps, etc. The token itself operates like Bitcoin and is secured by the network. Although you can use BAY for transactions, you don’t have to. You do, however, have to use BAY if you’d like to take part in token staking. BAY’s price cratered after the original founders left and stayed low until March 2017 when it took off. It has been through several cycles of bull and bear runs, with a max price over 30 cents in January 2018 before retreating to its current value.

BitBay supports all kinds of privacy and security measures. It’s easy to create a multisignature wallet for added security. There are integrations for Tor and other proxies that help anonymize your connection to the marketplace. An on-screen keyboard allows for password or key entry without using your keyboard and being susceptible to keylogging. Additionally, you can create images with your private key embedded, so that finding a stored key is more difficult for a hacker. The marketplace also has functionality for time locking contracts and swapping currencies. This enables all kinds of cross-chain transactions and financial implements. The time lock and other smart contract elements make it possible to create bets, escrow, futures and options trades, or any number of other financial transactions.

The idea and implementation by BitBay, of a decentralized marketplace and trading platform is brilliant and shows further promise of expansion.The rocky beginning of the cryptocurrency and its subsequent comeback as a promising platform indicate that the developers are in it for the long haul and don’t plan on abandoning the platform after all these years.
description.zh:
BitBay is a free, decentralized marketplace for buying and selling goods and services on the blockchain. You can connect directly with peers and transact without the need for a middleman like Amazon, eBay, or Craigslist. Transactions are secure and anonymous. They’re also guaranteed by escrow. The project aims to be the new standard for eCommerce, allowing individuals to trade one-to-one at scale. As a result, BitBay claims it will revolutionize global trade. It’s seemingly a great solution for other niche applications as well, where groups of people aren’t served by existing marketplaces. In the beginning, BitBay got off to a rocky start. In 2014, the original founders raised capital in bad faith and quickly abandoned the project after fundraising, leaving the lead developer holding the bag. It seemed like BitBay was finished, but the developer continued working on the project out of a sense of duty to the original investors, without access to the capital raised in the fundraising round.

description.ko: 비트베이(BAY)는 상품이나 서비스를 쉽고 안전하게, 그리고 익명으로 매매할 수 있는 안전한 분권형 개인간 마켓 플레이스를 제공합니다. 비트베이 플랫폼에서는 Double Deposit Escrow를 통해 전혀 신뢰관계가 구축되지 않은 당사자들 간의 거래를 안전하게 수행하도록 합니다.

status_updates.description:
The BitBay ‘Dynamic Peg’ is a brand new mechanism for stabilising a digital currency. It’s a value control system democratically controlled by the users, for the users.

Through a simple mechanism of freezing and unfreezing, stakers can collectively change the liquidity of BAY’s supply in order to change its price.

To find out more about this revolutionary method of currency stabilisation, have a read of the quick guide:

https://bitbay.market/downloads/bitbay-dynamic-peg-intro.pdf

Want to see what BitBay’s Dynamic Peg looks like under the microscope? 

Here’s an example of how “BAYtoshis” are organised into indexed columns instead of a disorganised pile of satoshis like Bitcoin!

https://imgur.com/Tcl4kWf

Why do we do it this way? Find out more tomorrow ...

📣 Community Update 📣

The BitBay devs have now restarted work on the required updates to make the web wallet compatible with the new Dynamic Peg protocol. 

And after the web wallet has been updated, we'll be releasing an update for the Android app, and then... building a new iPhone app for all our patient iOS users!

Trading has reopened for BitBay on the LATOKEN exchange!

The following pairs are now available to trade: BAY/BTC, BAYR/BTC, BAY/USDT, BAYR/USDT

https://exchange.latoken.com/exchange/BAY-BTC

Happy trading!

The BitBay Dynamic Peg is about to launch live on the LATOKEN exchange!

The following pairs will be available to trade:

BAY/BTC and BAYR/BTC
BAY/USDT and BAYR/USDT 

BAYR is the reserve 'layer' of the new BitBay Dynamic Peg protocol. For more info about this unique protocol visit https://bitbay.market

To sign up for an LATOKEN account use this link: go.latoken.com/cb

Read the latest BitBay community update, with a round up of all the recent news at BitBay. In this issue:

- 3 new exchanges announced for the Dynamic Peg release
- new static website hosted on GitHub Pages
- Web Marketplace update

Enjoy and share!

link.medium.com/m7I0EfEpDY

We are very happy to announce yet another exchange partner for the Dynamic Peg.

Chaoex.com is based in Hong Kong and was established in 2017. Serving the Chinese and Singapore markets, listing on Chaoex will help us reach a potentially huge new user base with the peg. 

Like latoken, the Chaoex dev team has already started getting to know the code and while we don’t have a set launch date for these two exchanges, we anticipate the peg to be live in approx 5-6 weeks.

More info soon...
